answers.answer: Angie, i dont know what the figures mean, but my advice is to trust YOUR instincts. Obviously it has you worried and no-one knows your body and baby better than you. Get in touch with your doc/midwife and insist on seeing them asap to ease your mind.Hope all is well,

Have you been checked for gestational diabetes?  Maybe check your blood sugar.  High blood sugar can caused blurred vision and headaches....have you had any other symproms?  Excessive thirst, feeling dizzy, unusual irritability?  Those are some other signs of dibetes.  Best of Luck.
always trust your gut. see your midwife now and if she won't see you sooner than 4 days go see someone else or even go to the er  as a last resort if all else fails and ask them what it means

question: Im 31weeks pregmnant with baby number 3, with other 2 pregnancies i suffered with pre eclampsia and am now suffering with terrible headaches and blurred vission, midwife says my BP isnt that high, however when she left she left some urine testing strips and i couldnt help myself and tested my urine myself, it showed +1 proteine, +2blood and +3 ketones, now im beside myself with worry and wont be seeing the midwife for 4more days, please tell me what this could be.
title: please help asap
